documents.document: Yada yada book Ditto what everyone else wrote.The elevator situation is much improved. Minimal waiting. No more long waits or hour to theatre show times. Another plus at the Marquis is that they will allow a cot in a standard room to accommodate 5 people (well, 2 adults and 3 kids anyway - it fit between the double beds in the room we had). You may want to call ahead in advance to make reservations at the revolving restaurant
